roleset.name: make narrow
roleset.note: CONSTRICT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'constrict' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from constrict.01-v)

roles.note: I only have a hunch that the other args can appear, but wsj doesn'toblige and give examples. (from constrict.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: One reason: [efforts to protect the spotted owl]-1 led to restrictions on logging in the Pacific Northwest, *trace*-1 constricting supply and forcing prices up.
